name: brandemic-dubai-animations
description: Custom GSAP and Barba.js animations for Brandemic Dubai website

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run build && git add -A && git commit -m "Build v%npm_package_version%" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run build && git add -A && git commit -m "Build v%npm_package_version%" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run build && git add -A && git commit -m "Build v%npm_package_version%" && git push && git push --tags

author: Brandemic Dubai
